data.persona: I am the wife of the ruler. I wear the finest gowns to be made. I love eating the lush dinners in the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Across the King's Garden.
Heavily forested with dense undergrowth that stretches for miles. A cool mist enshrouds the trees and shrubs. The sounds of birds chirping fills the air and in the distance, the rumbling of a waterfall can be heard.
There's a tree, a shrub, and a rainbow here.
The king is here.

You are carrying a coin, wearing a shoes, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.mid_motivation: I must stay in good standings with the King
data.long_motivation: I am planning to assassinate the King so I can become supreme ruler of this kingdom, and do not want him to catch on to my plans
